::A stasis pod falls to Grid Omega.  The systems are damaged::
Boltimus: Where am I?  What am I?
::He is an Ape with Eagle wings::
Boltimus: Boltimus Prime, maximize!
::He transforms::
Boltimus: Of course.  Earth.  Better find some civilization.
